https://tmrev.io/movie/619326-Always on a Tuesday 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aaYuUkDYaIwNZX6D6nsZ0UVS9oR.jpg Sanna and Moa are best friends. One afternoon a week the two girls are allowed to be home alone instead of going to After-school. It is exciting and of course they have to try everything they normally aren't allowed to do. But after a while the games become more serious and Sanna has a hard time finding a way out. Always on a Tuesday
